front.title: Border Gateway Protocol 4 (BGP-4) Send Hold Timer

abstract.t: This document defines the SendHoldTimer and SendHoldTime session attributes for the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Finite State Machine (FSM). Implementation of the SendHoldTimer helps overcome situations where a BGP session is not terminated after the local system detects that the remote system is not processing BGP messages. This document specifies that the local system should close the BGP connection and not solely rely on the remote system for session closure when the SendHoldTimer expires. This document updates RFC4271.
